arabicText: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ عُرْضَةًۭ لِّأَيْمَـٰنِكُمْ أَن تَبَرُّوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ وَتُصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	do	not	make	Allah a	target	of	your	oaths,	by	pledging	against	being	virtuous	and	pious,	and	
against	making	peace	among	mankind;	and	Allah is	All	Hearing,	All	Knowing
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ko	apni	qasmoñ	ka	nishāna	na	bana	lo	ke	ehsān	aur	parhez-gāri	aur	logoñ	meiñ	sulah	
karne	ki	qasam	karlo	aur	Allah	sunta	jānta	hai

arabicText: لَّا يُؤَاخِذُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِٱللَّغْوِ فِىٓ أَيْمَـٰنِكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن يُؤَاخِذُكُم بِمَا كَسَبَتْ قُلُوبُكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Allah does	 not	 take	 you	 to	 task	 for	 oaths	
which	 are	 made	 unintentionally	 but	 He	
does	 take	 you	 to	 task	 for	 deeds	 which	
your	 hearts	 have	 done;	 and	 Allah is	 Oft	
Forgiving,	Most	Forbearing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	 tumheiñ	 nahi	 pakadta	 un	 qasmoñ	
meiñ	 jo	 be	 irāda	 zabān	 se	 nikal	 jāye	 hāñ	
us	par	giraft	 farmāta	hai	jo	 kām	 tumhāre	
dil	 ne	 kiye	 aur	 Allah	 bakhsh	 ne	 wāla	 ilm	
wāla	hai

arabicText: لِّلَّذِينَ يُؤْلُونَ مِن نِّسَآئِهِمْ تَرَبُّصُ أَرْبَعَةِ أَشْهُرٍۢ ۖ فَإِن فَآءُو فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	swear	not	to	touch	their	wives	
have	 four	 months’	 time;	 so	 if	 they	 turn	
back	 during	 this	 period,	 indeed	 Allah is	
Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 woh jo	 qasam	 kha	 baithe	 haiñ	 apni	
aurtoñ	 ke	 pās	 jāne	 ki	 unheiñ	 chār	
maheene	ki	mohlat	hai	pas	agar	is	muddat	
meiñ	 phir	 āaye	 to	 Allah	 bakhsh	 ne	 wāla	
maherbān	hai

arabicText: وَإِنْ عَزَمُوا۟ ٱلطَّلَـٰقَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	they	firmly	decide	to	divorce	them,	
Allah is	All	Hearing,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 agar	 chord	 dene	 ka	 irāda	 pakka	 kar	
liya	to	Allah	sunta	jānta	hai

arabicText: وَٱلْمُطَلَّقَـٰتُ يَتَرَبَّصْنَ بِأَنفُسِهِنَّ ثَلَـٰثَةَ قُرُوٓءٍۢ ۚ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَهُنَّ أَن يَكْتُمْنَ مَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ فِىٓ أَرْحَامِهِنَّ إِن كُنَّ يُؤْمِنَّ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ ۚ وَبُعُولَتُهُنَّ أَحَقُّ بِرَدِّهِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ إِنْ أَرَادُوٓا۟ إِصْلَـٰحًۭا ۚ وَلَهُنَّ مِثْلُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَيْهِنَّ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ ۚ وَلِلرِّجَالِ عَلَيْهِنَّ دَرَجَةٌۭ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	 divorced	 women	 shall	 restrain	
themselves	 for	 three	 menstrual	 periods;	
and	 it	 is	 not	 lawful	 for them	 to	 conceal	
what	Allah has	 created	in	 their	wombs	if	
they	 believe	 in	 Allah and	 the	 Last	 Day;	
and	their	husbands	have	the	right	to	take	
them	back,	during	this	time,	if	they	desire	
reconciliation;	 and	 the	 women	 also	 have	
rights	similar	 to	 those	of	men	over	 them,	
in	accordance	with	Islamic	law	- and	men	
have	 superiority	 over	 them;	 and	Allah is	
Almighty,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 talāq	 wāliyāñ	 apni	 jānoñ	 ko	 roke	
raheiñ	teen	haiz	tak	aur	unheiñ	halāl	nahi	
ke	 chupāyeiñ	 woh	 jo	 Allah	 ne	 unke	 pet	
meiñ	 paida	 kiya	 agar	 Allah	 aur	 Qayāmat	
par	Imān	rakhti	haiñ	aur	unke	shauharoñ	
ko	is	muddat	ke	andar	unke	pher	lene	ka	
haq	pahuñchta	hai	agar	milāp	chāheiñ	aur	
aurtoñ	ka	bhi	haq	aisa	hi	hai	jaisa	un	par	
hai	 shar'a	 ke	muwāfiq	aur	mardoñ	 ko	 un	
par	 fazilat	 hai	 aur	 Allah	 ghālib	 hikmat	
wāla	hai

arabicText: ٱلطَّلَـٰقُ مَرَّتَانِ ۖ فَإِمْسَاكٌۢ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌۢ بِإِحْسَـٰنٍۢ ۗ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا۟ مِمَّآ ءَاتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْـًٔا إِلَّآ أَن يَخَافَآ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا ٱفْتَدَتْ بِهِۦ ۗ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا ۚ وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ ٱللَّهِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
This	 type	 of	 divorce	 is	 up	 to	 twice;	 the	
woman	 must	 then	 be	 retained	 on	 good	
terms	or	released	with	kindness;	and	it	is	
not	 lawful	 for	 you	 to	 take	 back	 from	
women	 a	 part	 of	 what	 you	 have	 given	
them	 except	 when	 both	 fear	 that	 they	
may	 not	 be	able	 to	 stay	within	 the	limits	
established	 by	 Allah;	 so	 if	 you	 fear	 that	
they	may	not	be	able	to	observe	the	limits	
of	Allah,	then	it	is	no	sin	on	them	if	the	woman	pays	to	get	her	release;	these	are	the	limits	set	
by	Allah,	so	do	not	exceed	them;	and	those	who	transgress	Allah’s	limits	are	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	 talāq	 do	 bār	 tak	 hai	 phir	 bhalāi	 ke	
sāth	rok	lena	hai	ya	nikoi (achche	sulook)	
ke	sāth	chord	dena	hai	aur	tumheiñ	rawāñ	
nahi	 ke jo	 kuch	 aurtoñ	 ko	 diya	 wāpas	 lo	
magar	jab	 donoñ	 ka	 andesha	 ho	 ke	Allah	
ki	 hadeiñ	 qāim	 na	 kareñge	 phir	 agar	
tumheiñ	 khauf	 ho	 ke	 woh	 dono	 theek	
unhiñ	 hadoñ	 par	 na	 raheñge	 to	 un	 par	
kuchh	gunāh	 nahi	is	meiñ	jo	 badla	 dekar	
aurat	chhutti	le	yeh	Allah	ki	hadeiñ haiñ	unse	āage	na	badho	aur	jo	Allah	ki	hadoñ	se	āge	badhe	
to	wohi	log	zālim	haiñ.

arabicText: فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا تَحِلُّ لَهُۥ مِنۢ بَعْدُ حَتَّىٰ تَنكِحَ زَوْجًا غَيْرَهُۥ ۗ فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَآ أَن يَتَرَاجَعَآ إِن ظَنَّآ أَن يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِ يُبَيِّنُهَا لِقَوْمٍۢ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	if	he	divorces	her	 the	 third	 time,	she	will	not	be	lawful	 to	him	until	she	has	stayed	with	
another	husband;	then	if	the	other	husband	divorces	her,	it	is	no	sin	for	these	two	to	reunite	if	
they	consider	that	they	can	keep	the	limits	of	Allah established;	these	are	the	limits	set	by	Allah
which	He	explains	for	people	of	intellect
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	agar	teesri	talāq	usey	di	to	ab	woh	aurat	usey	halāl	na	hogi	jab	tak	doosre	khuāwind	ke	pās	
na	 rahe	 phir	woh	 doosra	agar	ise	 talāq	 de	 de	 un	 dono	 par	gunāh	 nahi	 ke	 phir āpas	meiñ	mil	
jāyeiñ	 agar	 samjhte	 hoñ	 ke	 Allah	 ki	 hadeiñ	 nibhāyeñge	 aur	 yeh	 Allah	 ki	 hadeiñ	 haiñ	 jinheiñ	
bayān	karta	hai	dānish-mandoñ	ke	liye

arabicText: وَإِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ ٱلنِّسَآءَ فَبَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ سَرِّحُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍۢ ۚ وَلَا تُمْسِكُوهُنَّ ضِرَارًۭا لِّتَعْتَدُوا۟ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُۥ ۚ وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوٓا۟ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ هُزُوًۭا ۚ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَمَآ أَنزَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْحِكْمَةِ يَعِظُكُم بِهِۦ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	you	have	divorced	women,	and	
their	 term	 reaches	 its	 end,	 either	 retain	
them	on	good	terms	within	this	period	or	
release	 them	 with	 kindness;	 and	 do	 not	
retain	 them	in	 order	 to	hurt	 them,	hence	
transgressing	the	limits;	and	he	who	does	
so	 harms	 only himself;	 and	 do	 not	 make	
the	 signs	 of	Allah the	 objects	 of	 ridicule;	
and	 remember	 Allah’s	 favour	 that	 is	
bestowed	upon	 you	and	 that	He	has	sent	
down	 to	 you	 the	 Book	 and	 wisdom,	 for	
your	 guidance;	 keep	 fearing	 Allah and	
know	 well	 that	 Allah knows	 everything.	
(The	 traditions	 of	 the	 Holy	 Prophet	 –
sunnah	and	hadith	– are	called	wisdom.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jab	 tum	 aurtoñ	 ko	 talāq	 do	 aur	 unki	
mee'ād	ā	lage	to	us	waqt	tak	ya	bhalāi	ke	
sāth	 rok	 lo	 ya	 nikoi (achche	 sulook) ke	
sāth	 chhod	 do	 aur	 unheiñ	 zarar	 dene	 ke	
liye	 rokna	 na	 ho	 ke	 had	 se	 badho	 aur	 jo	
aisa	 kare	 woh	 apna	 hi	 nuqsān	 karta	 hai	
aur	Allah	 hi	 ki	 āyatoñ	 ko	 that-ta	 na	 banā	
lo	aur	yād	karo	Allah	ka	ehsān	jo	tum	par	
hai	 aur	 woh	 jo	 tum	 par	 Kitāb	 woh	 utāri	
tumheiñ	 naseehat	 dene	 ko	 aur	 Allah	 se	
darte	 raho	 aur	 jān	 rakho	 ke	 Allah	 sab	
kuch	kar	sakta	hai

arabicText: وَإِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ ٱلنِّسَآءَ فَبَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَلَا تَعْضُلُوهُنَّ أَن يَنكِحْنَ أَزْوَٰجَهُنَّ إِذَا تَرَٰضَوْا۟ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ ۗ ذَٰلِكَ يُوعَظُ بِهِۦ مَن كَانَ مِنكُمْ يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ ۗ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَزْكَىٰ لَكُمْ وَأَطْهَرُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	you	have	divorced	women	and	
they	complete	their	waiting	period	- then	
O	 guardians	 of	 such	 women,	 do	 not	
prevent	 them	 from	 marrying	 their	
husbands	 if	 they	 agree	 between	
themselves	 in	 accordance	 with	 Islamic	
law;	this	lesson	is	for	those	among	People	
who	 Believe	 in	 Allah and	 the	 Last	 Day;	
this	 is	 purer	 for	 you,	 and	 cleaner;	 and	
Allah knows	and	you	do	not	know.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jab	 tum	 aurtoñ	 ko	 talāq	 do	 aur	 unki	
mee'ād	 poori	 ho	 jāye	 to	 aey	 aurtoñ	 ke	
wāliyo	 unheiñ	 na	 rokoñ	 is	 se	 ke	 apne	
shauharoñ	 se	 nikah	 kar	 leiñ	 jab	 ke	 āpas	
meiñ	 muwāfiq-e-shar'a	 raza-mand	 ho	
jāyeiñ	yeh	naseehat	use	di	jāti	hai	jo	 tum	
meiñ	 se	 Allah	 aur	 Qayāmat	 par	 Imān	
rakhta	ho	yeh	 tumhāre	liye	ziyāda	suthra	
aur	 pākizah	 hai	 aur	 Allah	 jānta	 hai	 aur	
tum	nahi	jānte

arabicText: ۞ وَٱلْوَٰلِدَٰتُ يُرْضِعْنَ أَوْلَـٰدَهُنَّ حَوْلَيْنِ كَامِلَيْنِ ۖ لِمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يُتِمَّ ٱلرَّضَاعَةَ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱلْمَوْلُودِ لَهُۥ رِزْقُهُنَّ وَكِسْوَتُهُنَّ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ ۚ لَا تُكَلَّفُ نَفْسٌ إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۚ لَا تُضَآرَّ وَٰلِدَةٌۢ بِوَلَدِهَا وَلَا مَوْلُودٌۭ لَّهُۥ بِوَلَدِهِۦ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱلْوَارِثِ مِثْلُ ذَٰلِكَ ۗ فَإِنْ أَرَادَا فِصَالًا عَن تَرَاضٍۢ مِّنْهُمَا وَتَشَاوُرٍۢ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا ۗ وَإِنْ أَرَدتُّمْ أَن تَسْتَرْضِعُوٓا۟ أَوْلَـٰدَكُمْ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذَا سَلَّمْتُم مَّآ ءَاتَيْتُم بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ ۗ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 mothers	 shall	 breast-feed	 their	
children	for	two	full	years	- for	those	who	
wish	to	complete	the	term	of	milk	feeding;	
and	 the	 father	 of	 the	 child	 must	 provide	
for	 food	 and	 clothing	 of	 the	 mother	 in	
accordance	 with	 custom;	 no	 one	 will	 be	
burdened	except	with	what	he	can	bear;	a	mother	should	not	be	harmed	because	of	her	child,	
nor	he	to	whom	the	child	is	born	be	harmed	because	of	his	child	(or	a	mother	should	not	harm	
the	child	nor	he	to	whom	the	child	is	born	should	harm	the	child);	and	the	same	is	incumbent	on	
the	 guardian	 in	 place	 of	 the	 father;	 then	 if	 the	 parents	 desire	 to	 wean	 the	 child	 by	 mutual	
consent	and	consultation,	it	is	no	sin	 for	 them;	and	if	 you	wish	 to	give	 your	children	out	 to	a	
(milk	 feeding)	 nurse,	 it	 is	 no	 sin	 for	 you,	 provided	 you	 pay	 to	 them	 what	 is	 agreed,	 with	
kindness;	and	keep	fearing	Allah,	and	know	well	that	Allah is	seeing	what	you	do
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 māyeiñ	 doodh	 pilāyeiñ	 apne	
bachchoñ	 ko	 poore	 do	 baras	 uske	 liye	 jo	
doodh	 ki	 muddat	 poori	 karna	 chāhe	 aur	
jis	ka	bachcha	hai	us	par	aurtoñ	ka	khāna	
aur	 pahen	 na	 hai	 hasbe	 dastoor	 kisi	 jān	
par	 bojh	 na	 rakha	 jayega	 magar	 uske	
maqdoor	 bhar	 mā	 ka	 zarar	 na	 diya	 jāye	
uske	bachche	se	aur	na	aulād	wāle	ko	uski	
aulād	se	ya	mā	zarar	na	de	apne	bachche	
ko	aur	na	aulād	wāla	apni	aulād	ko	aur	jo	
bāp	ka	qāim	maqām	hai	us	par	bhi	aisa	hi	wājib	hai	phir	agar	mā	bāp	donoñ	āpas	ki	raza	aur	
mashware	se	doodh	chhudāna	chāheiñ	 to	unpar	gunah	nahi	aur	agar	 tum	chāho	ke	dāiyoñ	se	
apne	bachche	ko	doodh	pilwao to	bhi	tum	par	muzāiqa	nahi	jab	ke	jo	dena	thehra	tha	bhalāi	ke	
sāth	unheiñ	ada	kardo	aur	Allah	se	darte	raho	aur	jān	rakho	ke	Allah	tumhāre	kām	dekh	rahā	
hai

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُتَوَفَّوْنَ مِنكُمْ وَيَذَرُونَ أَزْوَٰجًۭا يَتَرَبَّصْنَ بِأَنفُسِهِنَّ أَرْبَعَةَ أَشْهُرٍۢ وَعَشْرًۭا ۖ فَإِذَا بَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِيمَا فَعَلْنَ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِنَّ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 those	 among	 you	 who	 die	 leaving	
wives	 behind	 them,	 then	 such	 widows	
shall	restrain	themselves	 for	 four	months	
and	 ten	 days;	 so	 when	 their	 term	 is	
completed,	 O	 guardians	 of	 such	 women,	
there	is	no	sin	on	you in	what	the	women	
may	decide	 for	 themselves	in	accordance	
with	Islamic	law;	and	Allah is	Well	Aware	
of	what	you	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tum	 meiñ	 jo	 mareiñ	 aur	 biwiyāñ	
chordeiñ	 woh	 chār	 mahine	 das	 din	 apne	
āp	ko	roke	raheiñ	 to	jab	unki	iddat	poori	
ho	jāye	 to	 aey	wāliyo	 tum	 par	muākhaza	
nahi	 us	 kām	 meiñ	 jo	 aurteiñ	 apne	
mu'āmle	 meiñ	 muwāfiq-e-shar'a	 kareiñ	
aur	 Allah	 ko	 tumhāre	 kāmoñ	 ki	 khabar	
hai

arabicText: وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِيمَا عَرَّضْتُم بِهِۦ مِنْ خِطْبَةِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ أَوْ أَكْنَنتُمْ فِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ أَنَّكُمْ سَتَذْكُرُونَهُنَّ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تُوَاعِدُوهُنَّ سِرًّا إِلَّآ أَن تَقُولُوا۟ قَوْلًۭا مَّعْرُوفًۭا ۚ وَلَا تَعْزِمُوا۟ عُقْدَةَ ٱلنِّكَاحِ حَتَّىٰ يَبْلُغَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ أَجَلَهُۥ ۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ فَٱحْذَرُوهُ ۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	there	is	no	sin	on	you	if	you	propose	
marriage	to	women	while	they	are	hidden	
from	your	view,	or	hide	it	in	your	hearts;	
Allah knows	that	you	will	now	remember	
them,	 but	 do	 not	 make	 secret	 pacts	 with	
women	 except	 by	 decent	 words	
recognised	 by	 Islamic	 law;	 and	 do	 not	
consummate	 the	 marriage	 until	 the	
written	command	reaches	its	completion;	
know	 well	 that	 Allah knows	 what	 is	 in	
your	hearts,	therefore	fear	Him;	and	know	
well	 that	 Allah is	 Oft	 Forgiving,	 Most	
Forbearing
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tum	 par	 gunāh	 nahi	 is	 bāt	 meiñ	 jo	
parda	 rakh	 kar	 tum	 aurtoñ	 ke	 nikāh	 ka	
payām	do	ya	apne	dil	meiñ	chhupa	rakho	
Allah jānta	hai	ke	ab	tum	unki	yād	karoge	
hāñ	 unse	 khufiya	 wa'da	 na	 kar	 rakho	
magar	 yeh	 ke	 itni	 hi	 bāt	 kaho	 jo	 shar'a	
meiñ	m'aroof	hai aur nikāh	ki	girah	pakki	
na	 karo	 jab	 tak	 likha	 huwa	 hukm	 apni	
mee'ād	 ko	 na	 pahuñch	 le	 aur	 jān	 lo	 ke	
Allah	tumhāre	dil	ki	jānta hai	to	us	se	daro	
aur	 jān	 lo	 ke	 Allah	 bakhsh	 ne	 wāla	 hilm	
wāla	hai.

arabicText: لَّا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِن طَلَّقْتُمُ ٱلنِّسَآءَ مَا لَمْ تَمَسُّوهُنَّ أَوْ تَفْرِضُوا۟ لَهُنَّ فَرِيضَةًۭ ۚ وَمَتِّعُوهُنَّ عَلَى ٱلْمُوسِعِ قَدَرُهُۥ وَعَلَى ٱلْمُقْتِرِ قَدَرُهُۥ مَتَـٰعًۢا بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ ۖ حَقًّا عَلَى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
There	 is	 no	 sin	 upon	 you	 if	 you	 divorce	
women	while	you	have	not	touched	them	
or	appointed	their	bridal	money;	and	give	
them	 some	 provision;	 the	 rich	 according	
to	their	means,	and	the	poor	according	to	
their	means;	a	fair	provision	according	to	
custom;	this	is	a	duty	upon	the	virtuous.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Tum	 par	 kuchh	 mutālba	 nahi	 agar	 tum	
aurtoñ	 ko	 talāq	 do	 jab	 tak	 tum	 ne	 unko	
hāth	na	lagāya	ho	ya	koi	maher	muqarrar	
kar	liya	 ho	 aur	 unko	 kuch	 baratne	 ko	 do	
maqdoor	wāle	par	uske	lāiq	aur	tang-dast	
par	uske	lāiq	hasb-e-dastoor	kuch	baratne	
ki	cheez	yeh	wājib	hai	bhalāi	wāloñ	par.

arabicText: وَإِن طَلَّقْتُمُوهُنَّ مِن قَبْلِ أَن تَمَسُّوهُنَّ وَقَدْ فَرَضْتُمْ لَهُنَّ فَرِيضَةًۭ فَنِصْفُ مَا فَرَضْتُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يَعْفُونَ أَوْ يَعْفُوَا۟ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ عُقْدَةُ ٱلنِّكَاحِ ۚ وَأَن تَعْفُوٓا۟ أَقْرَبُ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ ۚ وَلَا تَنسَوُا۟ ٱلْفَضْلَ بَيْنَكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
englishTranslationText:
If	you	divorce	them	before	you	have	touched	them	and	have	appointed	the	bridal	money,	then	
payment	of	half	of	what	is	agreed	is	ordained	unless	the	women	forgo	some	of	it,	or	he	in	whose	
hand	is	the	marriage	tie,	pays	more;	and	O	men,	your	paying	more	is	closer	to	piety;	and	do	not	
forget	the	favours	to	each	other;	indeed	Allah is	seeing	what	you	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	tum	ne	aurtoñ	ko	be-chuwe	talāq	de	di	aur	unke	liye	kuch	maher	muqarrar	kar	chuke	
they	to	jitna	thahra	tha	uska	ādha	wājib	hai	magar	yeh	ke	aurteiñ	kuch	chord	deiñ	woh	ziyāda	
de	 jiske	 hāth	 meiñ	 nikāh	 ki	 girah	 hai	 aur	 aey	 mardoñ	 tumhāra	 ziyāda	 dena	 parhez-gāri	 se	
nazdeek	tar	hai	aur	āpas	meiñ	ek	doosre	par	ehsān	ko	bhula	na	do	beshak	Allah	tumhāre	kām	
dekh	raha	hai

arabicText: حَـٰفِظُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلصَّلَوَٰتِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱلْوُسْطَىٰ وَقُومُوا۟ لِلَّهِ قَـٰنِتِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Guard	 all	 your	 prayers,	 and	 the	 middle	
prayer;	 and	 stand	 with	 reverence	 before	
Allah
romanUrduTranslationText:
Nigehbāni	karo	sab	Namāzoñ	ki	aur	beech	
ki	Namāz	ki	aur	khade	ho	Allah	ke	huzoor	
adab	se

arabicText: فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ فَرِجَالًا أَوْ رُكْبَانًۭا ۖ فَإِذَآ أَمِنتُمْ فَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَمَا عَلَّمَكُم مَّا لَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	 you	are	in	 fear,	pray	while	on	 foot	
or	while	riding,	as	you	can;	when	you	are	
in	peace	remember	Allah the	way	He	has	
taught	you,	which	you	did	not	know.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Phir	 agar	 khauf	 meiñ	 hoto	 piyādah	 ya	
sawār	jaise	ban	pade	phir	jab	itmenān se	
ho	to	Allah	ki	yād	karo	jaisa	usne	sikhāya	
jo	tum	na	jānte	they	.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُتَوَفَّوْنَ مِنكُمْ وَيَذَرُونَ أَزْوَٰجًۭا وَصِيَّةًۭ لِّأَزْوَٰجِهِم مَّتَـٰعًا إِلَى ٱلْحَوْلِ غَيْرَ إِخْرَاجٍۢ ۚ فَإِنْ خَرَجْنَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِى مَا فَعَلْنَ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِنَّ مِن مَّعْرُوفٍۢ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 those	 among	 you	 who	 die	 leaving	
wives	 behind	 them	 - they	 should	
bequeath	 for	 their	 wives	 a	 complete	
provision	 for	 one	 full	 year	 without	
turning	 them	 out;	 so	 if	 they	 go	 out	
themselves,	 there	 is	 no	 sin	 on	 you	
regarding	what	they	do	of	themselves	in	a	
reasonable	manner;	and	Allah is	Almighty,	
Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jo	 tum	 meiñ	 mareiñ	 aur	 biwiyāñ	
chhod	 jāyeiñ	 aurtoñ	 ke	 liye	 wasiyat	 kar	
jāyeiñ	 sāl	 bhar	 tak	 nān-o-nafqa	 dene	 ki	
be-nikāle	phir	agar	woh	khud	nikal	jāyeiñ	
to	 tum	 par	 iska	 mu'ākhza	 nahi Jo	 unhoñ	
ne	 apne	mu'āmle	meiñ	munāsib	 taur	 par	
kiya	aur	Allah	ghālib	hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: وَلِلْمُطَلَّقَـٰتِ مَتَـٰعٌۢ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ ۖ حَقًّا عَلَى ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 talāq	 wāliyoñ	 ke	 liye	 bhi	 munāsib	
nān-o-nafqa	 hai	 yeh	 wājib	 hai	 parhezgāroñ	par

arabicText: كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
This	 is	 how	 Allah explains	 His	 verses	 to	
you	so	that	you	may understand.
romanUrduTranslationText: Allah	yooñ	hi	bayān	karta	hai	tumhāre	liye	apni	Āyateiñ	ke	kahiñ	tumheiñ	samjh	ho

arabicText: وَقَـٰتِلُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText: And	fight	in	Allah's	cause	and	know	well	that	Allah is	All	Hearing,	All	Knowing
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	lardo	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	aur	jān	lo	ke	Allah	sunta	jānta	hai

arabicText: مَّن ذَا ٱلَّذِى يُقْرِضُ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًۭا فَيُضَـٰعِفَهُۥ لَهُۥٓ أَضْعَافًۭا كَثِيرَةًۭ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَقْبِضُ وَيَبْصُۜطُ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Is	 there	someone	who	will	lend	an	excellent	loan	 to	Allah,	so	 that	He	may	increase	it	 for	him	
several	times	over?	And	Allah restricts	and	eases	(the	sustenance)	- and	it	is	to	Him	that	you	will	
return.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hai	 koi	 jo	 Allah	 ko	 qarz-e-hasan	 de	 to	 Allah	 uske	 liye	 bahut	 guna	 badha	 de	 Allah	 tangi	 aur	
kushaish	karta	hai	aur	tumheiñ	usi	ki	taraf	phir	jāna

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ مِنۢ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ قَالُوا۟ لِنَبِىٍّۢ لَّهُمُ ٱبْعَثْ لَنَا مَلِكًۭا نُّقَـٰتِلْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ قَالَ هَلْ عَسَيْتُمْ إِن كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْقِتَالُ أَلَّا تُقَـٰتِلُوا۟ ۖ قَالُوا۟ وَمَا لَنَآ أَلَّا نُقَـٰتِلَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَدْ أُخْرِجْنَا مِن دِيَـٰرِنَا وَأَبْنَآئِنَا ۖ فَلَمَّا كُتِبَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقِتَالُ تَوَلَّوْا۟ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا مِّنْهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. Did	 you	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad -
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	not	see	a	
group	 of	 the	 Descendants	 of	 Israel,	 after	
Moosa?	 When	 they	 said	 to	 one	 of	 their	
Prophets	(Shamueel	- Samuel),	“Appoint	a	
king	for	us	 so	that	we	may	fight	in	Allah’s	
way”?	 He	 said,	 “Do	 you	 think	 you	 would	
refrain	 from	 fighting	 if	 it	 is	 made	
obligatory	 for	 you?”	 They	 said,	 “What	 is	
the	 matter	 with	 us	 that	 we	 should	 not	
fight	 in	 Allah’s	 cause,	 whereas	 we	 have	
been	driven	away	from	our	homeland	and	
our	 children?”	 So	 when	 fighting	 was	
ordained	 for	 them,	 they	 all	 turned	 away,	
except	 a	 few;	 and	Allah is	Well	 Aware	 of	
the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aey	 Mehboob kiya	 tumne	 na	 dekha	 bani	
Isra’il	 ke	 ek	 giroh	 ko	 jo	 moosa	 ke	 b'ad	
huwa	 jab	 apne	 ek	 Paighambar	 se	 bole	
hamāre	 liye	 khadā	 kardo	 ek	 bādshāh	 ke	
hum	 khuda	 ki	 rāh	 meiñ	 ladeiñ	 Nabi	 ne	
farmāya	kiya	 tumhāre	andāz	aise	haiñ	ke	
tum	 par	 Jihād	 farz	 kiya	 jāye	 to	 phir	 na	
karo	bole	hameiñ	kiya	huwa	ke	ham	Allah	
ki	rāh	meiñ	na	ladeiñ	halāñke	ham	nikāle	
gaye	haiñ	apne	watan	aur	apni	aulād	se	to	
phir	jab	un	par	jihād	farz	kiya	gaya	mooñh	
pher	 gaye	 magar	 un	 meiñ	 ke	 thode	 aur	
Allah khoob	jānta	hai	zālimoñ	ko

arabicText: وَقَالَ لَهُمْ نَبِيُّهُمْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدْ بَعَثَ لَكُمْ طَالُوتَ مَلِكًۭا ۚ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ عَلَيْنَا وَنَحْنُ أَحَقُّ بِٱلْمُلْكِ مِنْهُ وَلَمْ يُؤْتَ سَعَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمَالِ ۚ قَالَ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصْطَفَىٰهُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَزَادَهُۥ بَسْطَةًۭ فِى ٱلْعِلْمِ وَٱلْجِسْمِ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ يُؤْتِى مُلْكَهُۥ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 their	 Prophet	 said	 to	 them,	 “Indeed	
Allah has	sent	Talut	(Saul)	as	 your	 king”;	
they	 said,	 “Why	 should	 he	 have	 kingship	
over	us	whereas	we	deserve	the	kingship	
more	 than	he,	and	nor	has	he	been	given	
enough	 wealth?”	 He	 said,	 “Indeed	 Allah
has	 chosen	 him	 above	 you,	 and	 has	
bestowed	 him	 with	 vast	 knowledge	 and	
physique”;	 and	 Allah may	 bestow	 His	
kingdom	 on	 whomever	 He	 wills;	 and	
Allah is	Most	Capable,	All	Knowing
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 unse	 unke	 Nabi	 ne	 farmāya	 beshak	
Allah	 ne	 Taloot	 ko	 tumhāra	 bādshāh	
banākar	 bheja	 hai	 bole	 usey	 ham	 par	
bādshāhi	kiyuñ	kar	hogi	aur	ham	us	se	ziyāda	saltanat	ke	mustahiq	haiñ	aur	usey	māl	meiñ	bhi	
wus'at	nahi	di	gyi	farmāya	usey	Allah	ne	tum	par	chun	liya	aur	usey	ilm	aur	jism	meiñ	kushadgi	
ziyāda	di	aur	Allah	apna	mulk	jise	chāhe	de	aur	Allah	wus'at	wāla	ilm	wāla	hai

arabicText: وَقَالَ لَهُمْ نَبِيُّهُمْ إِنَّ ءَايَةَ مُلْكِهِۦٓ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلتَّابُوتُ فِيهِ سَكِينَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَبَقِيَّةٌۭ مِّمَّا تَرَكَ ءَالُ مُوسَىٰ وَءَالُ هَـٰرُونَ تَحْمِلُهُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةًۭ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 their	 Prophet	 said	 to	 them,	 “Indeed	
the	sign	of	his	kingdom	will	be	the	coming	of	a	(wooden)	box	to	you,	in	which	from	your	Lord	is	
the	 contentment	 of	 hearts	 and	 containing	 some	 souvenirs	 (remnants)	 left	 behind	 by	 the	
honourable	Moosa	and	 the	honourable	Haroon	(Aaron),	borne	by	 the	angels;	indeed	in	it	is	a	
great	sign*	for	you	if	you	are	believers.”	(The	remnants	of	pious	persons	are	blessed	by	Allah.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	unse	unke	Nabi	ne	farmāya	uski	bādshāhi	ki	nishāni	yeh	hai	ke	āye	tumhāre	pās	Taboot	jis	
meiñ	 tumhāre	Rab ki	 taraf	se	diloñ	ka	chain	hai	aur	kuch	bachi	huwi	chizeiñ	mo'azzaz	moosa	
aur	mo'azzaz	Haroon	ke	tarke	ki	uthāte	lāyeñ	ge	usey	firishtey	beshak	is	meiñ	badi	nishāni	hai	
tumhāre	liye	agar	Imān	rakhte	ho

arabicText: فَلَمَّا فَصَلَ طَالُوتُ بِٱلْجُنُودِ قَالَ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُبْتَلِيكُم بِنَهَرٍۢ فَمَن شَرِبَ مِنْهُ فَلَيْسَ مِنِّى وَمَن لَّمْ يَطْعَمْهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ مِنِّىٓ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱغْتَرَفَ غُرْفَةًۢ بِيَدِهِۦ ۚ فَشَرِبُوا۟ مِنْهُ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا مِّنْهُمْ ۚ فَلَمَّا جَاوَزَهُۥ هُوَ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ قَالُوا۟ لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِجَالُوتَ وَجُنُودِهِۦ ۚ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَظُنُّونَ أَنَّهُم مُّلَـٰقُوا۟ ٱللَّهِ كَم مِّن فِئَةٍۢ قَلِيلَةٍ غَلَبَتْ فِئَةًۭ كَثِيرَةًۢ بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. So	when	Talut	left	the	city	along	with the	
armies,	he	said,	“Allah will	surely	test	you	
with	a	river;	so	whoever	drinks	its	water	
is	not	mine	- and	whoever	does	not	drink	
is	 mine	- except	 him	 who	 takes	 it	 in	 the	
hollow	 of	 his	 hand”;	 so	 they	 all	 drank	 it,	
except	 a	 few	 of	 them;	 thereafter	 when	
Talut	 and	 the	 believers	 with	 him	 had	
crossed	 the	 river,	 they	 said,	 “We	 do	 not	
have	power	this	day	to	face	Jalut	(Goliath)	
and	 his	 armies”;	 those	 who	 were	 certain	
of	meeting	Allah said,	“Many	a	times	has	a	
smaller	 group	 overcome	 a	 bigger	 group	
by	Allah’s	command;	and	Allah is	with	the	
steadfast.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	Taloot	lashkaroñ	ko	lekar	shaher	
se	 juda	 huwa	 bola	 beshak	 Allah	 tumheiñ	
ek	 naher	 se	 āzmāne	 wāla	 hai	 to	 jo	 uska	
pāni	 piye	 woh	 mera	 nahi	 aur	 jo	 na	 piye	
woh	 mera	 hai	 magar	 woh	 jo	 ek	 chullu	
apne	 hāth	 se	 lele	 to	 sab	 ne	 us	 se	 piya	
magar	thodoñ	ne	phir	jab	Taloot	aur	uske	
sāth	ke	muslaman	naher	ke	pār	gaye	bole	
ham	 meiñ	 āaj	 tāqat	 nahi	 jaloot	 aur	 uske	
lashkaroñ	 ki	 bole	 woh	 jinheiñ	 Allah	 se	
milne	 ka	 yaqeen	 tha	 ke	 bārha	 kam	jamāt	
ghalib	 āayi	 hai	 ziyāda	 giroh	 par	 Allah	 ke	
hukm	se	aur	Allah	sābiroñ	ke	sāth	hai

arabicText: وَلَمَّا بَرَزُوا۟ لِجَالُوتَ وَجُنُودِهِۦ قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَآ أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْرًۭا وَثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَنَا وَٱنصُرْنَا عَلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 they	 confronted	 Jalut	 and	 his	
armies	 they	 invoked,	 “Our	 Lord!	 Pour	
(bestow	 abundantly)	 on	 us	 patience	
(fortitude),	and	 keep	 our	 feet	 steady,	and	
help	us	against	the	disbelieving	people.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 jab	 sāmne	 āaye	 jālot	 aur	 uske	
lashkaroñ	 ke	arz	 ki	aey	Rab	hamāre	ham	
par	sabr	undel	de	aur	hamāre	pāoñ	 Jame	
rakh	aur	kāfir	logoñ	par	hamāri	madad	kar

arabicText: فَهَزَمُوهُم بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَتَلَ دَاوُۥدُ جَالُوتَ وَءَاتَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُلْكَ وَٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَعَلَّمَهُۥ مِمَّا يَشَآءُ ۗ وَلَوْلَا دَفْعُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلنَّاسَ بَعْضَهُم بِبَعْضٍۢ لَّفَسَدَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	 they	 routed	 them	 by	 the	 command	 of	
Allah;	and	Dawud	(David)	 slew	 Jalut,	and	
Allah gave	him	the	kingdom	and	wisdom,	
and	 taught	 him	 all	 whatever	 He	 willed;	
and	if	Allah does	not	ward	off	some	men	by	others,	the	earth	will	be	destroyed,	but	Allah is	Most	
Munificent	towards	the	entire	creation
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	unhoñ	ne	unko	bhagā	diya	Allah	ke	hukm	se	aur	qatl	kiya	Dawood ne	Jālot	ko	aur	Allah	ne	
usey	saltanat	aur	hikmat	atā	farmāyi	aur	usey	jo	chāha	sikhāya	aur	agar	Allah	logoñ	meiñ	b'az	
se	b'az	daf'a	na	kare	to	zaroor	zameen	tabāh	ho	jāye	magar	Allah	sāre	jahāñ	par	fazl	karne	wāla	
hai

arabicText: تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتْلُوهَا عَلَيْكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ وَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
These	are	the	verses	of	Allah,	which	We	recite	to	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	
blessings	be	upon	him)	with	truth;	and	undoubtedly	you	are	one	of	the	Noble	Messengers
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	 Allah	 ki	 āyateiñ	 haiñ	 ke	 hum	 aey	Mehboob!	 Tum	 par	 theek	 theek	 pardhte	 haiñ	 aur	 tum	
beshak	Rasooloñ	meiñ	ho
